alert.note: Alert for Davison; Hanson; Hutchinson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 2:17AM MDT until June 24 at 2:45AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Davison County in southeastern South Dakota... Hanson County in southeastern South Dakota... Northwestern Hutchinson County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 317 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dimock, or near Parkston, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ethan and Milltown around 320 AM CDT. Alexandria around 335 AM CDT. Emery and Fulton around 340 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
